#### `b4fb234b95b140b70f5a77d8d56739d85b34ad968013488ccb874a9990857625`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		bzip2 \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.bz2/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.bz2 \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.bz2.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.bz2.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.bz2.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.bz2 -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.bz2* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `b4fb234b95b140b70f5a77d8d56739d85b34ad968013488ccb874a9990857625`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		bzip2 \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.bz2/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.bz2 \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.bz2.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.bz2.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.bz2.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.bz2 -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.bz2* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `62f97767aa3236f2d63a34c53829e09418c56e6791a34112705f541746947471`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		bzip2 \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.bz2/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.bz2 \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.bz2.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.bz2.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.bz2.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.bz2 -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.bz2* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `62f97767aa3236f2d63a34c53829e09418c56e6791a34112705f541746947471`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		bzip2 \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.bz2/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.bz2 \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.bz2.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.bz2.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.bz2.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.bz2 -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.bz2* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		bzip2 \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.bz2/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.bz2 \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.bz2.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.bz2.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.bz2.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.bz2 -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.bz2* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `2d56de495567b1652cab5eee8c3241f0dd2f5f792cca9eaddeb1c5019c38996b`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `6b6e9b6f0a4f1a5d4c60eb5839cf1214eaaaa4125c5d5e3067c69ade20be00e9`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean

#### `e69b2f761e7dae6600a963dfdd18a8cb4ed0cb64cc40007307cf1e7ea827895d`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `e69b2f761e7dae6600a963dfdd18a8cb4ed0cb64cc40007307cf1e7ea827895d`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `c9fdb32c012714d3e93b4d3b641032ca97c6b0e464de3cee8e75039bbb6be710`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `eafc358e1bc7693f95d27e44d89cd45494af80df649adebe596117b2e95f10b9`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `eafc358e1bc7693f95d27e44d89cd45494af80df649adebe596117b2e95f10b9`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

		libcurl4-openssl-dev \

		libssl-dev \

		xz-utils \
	" \

	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \

		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \

	&& make install \

#### `18a98c552763aeca4653bb1499d8882cb7572ad7ed51580160cd17af2d22066c`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "https://downloads.php.net/~ab/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `03ea88f7a9112ce1614b2b057d8b5e0577a21e1f2e9bc4d4ed8405427a5f0a6e`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "https://downloads.php.net/~ab/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `03ea88f7a9112ce1614b2b057d8b5e0577a21e1f2e9bc4d4ed8405427a5f0a6e`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libpcre3-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "https://downloads.php.net/~ab/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-pcre \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```
